title: Fluorescence nanoprobes bearing low temperature-derived biochar nanoparticles as efficient quenchers for the detection of single-stranded DNA and 17β-estradiol and their analytical potential
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28077-28085
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03168G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiaoli Qi, Hui Hu, Lina Liang, Yuqing Lin, Yudan Liu, Haifeng Sun, Yunxian Piao
The first application of fluorescent nanoprobes using low-temperature bagasse derived quencher nanoparticles (BQNPs) as effective quenchers for ssDNA and 17-estradiol detection.
